advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted PDF file may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged position may be able to perform a denial of service attack
advisories.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in libarchive
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues existed in libarchive. These issues were addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to delete files for which it does not have permission
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to identify what other applications a user has installed
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.impact: A user may be able to bypass the Emergency SOS passcode prompt
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to read other applications' settings
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t), Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) and Yuebin Sun (@yuebinsun2020) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: A user interface issue was addressed.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Sudhakar Muthumani (@sudhakarmuthu04) of Primefort Private Limited, Khiem Tran

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a device may be able to use Siri to obtain some location information from the lock screen
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Andrew Goldberg of the University of Texas at Austin, McCombs School of Business (linkedin.com/andrew-goldberg-/)

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to see sensitive information via keyboard suggestions
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information
advisories.description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Quan Yin of Bigo Technology Live Client Team

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

Kirin (@Pwnrin) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Jeonghoon Shin at Theori working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A malicious website may cause unexpected cross-origin behavior
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.
